abstract: New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi holds news conference to discuss the team's failure to get past first round of playoffs and what lies ahead for next year.
snippet: Joe Girardi defended his players after an early playoff exit, talked about the losses to the starting rotation and said that filling those holes would be the focus in the off-season.
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi defended his players after an early playoff exit, talked about the losses to the starting rotation and said that filling those holes would be the focus in the off-season.

headline.main: Pitching Still Priority in Yankees’ Off-Season
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Off-Season Again Focuses on Hunt For Front-Line Pitching
headline.seo: For Yankees, Offseason Again Turns to Hunt for Pitching
